articles.title: Gaikwad ruled out of Test series vs South Africa; Easwaran named as replacement - Hindustan Times
articles.description: BCCI also made wholesome changes to India A team. The statement added that Harshit Rana has been ruled out of the four-day India A tour match vs South Africa A | Cricket
articles.content: India opener Ruturaj Gaikwad has been officially ruled out of the three-match Test series against South Africa that begins from December 26 onwards in Centurion. Gaikwad, who had fractured his finger… [+1744 chars]
